item.title: Flipkart
item.description: Since January 2021, I have been working at Flipkart, Jan 2021 to June 2021 as a Intern and since July of same year as a full time Software Development Engineer. Team Here at Flipkart, I am part of Jeeves team which works to imporve experiece of customers and technicians for various post delivery services provided by Fk.

item.title: Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology
item.description: This is my graduation school, I majored in Computer Engineering here. Academics Here are few subjects which I took and enjoyed in here, go ahead if this peeks your interest: (Just sharing my favourites here) Semester Eight UCS742 - INTERNSHIP Semester Seven UCS742 - DEEP LEARNING UCS794 - CAPSTONE - Worked with an Amazing team and delivered NARAD: more about it in projects! Semester Six UCS633 - DATA ANALYTICS & VISUALIZATION UCS525 - PROFESSIONAL PRACTICES UTA012 - INNOVATION AND ENTREPRENEURSHIP UML602 - NATURAL LANGUAGE PROCESSING Semester Five UHU008 - INTRODUCTION TO CORPORATE FINANCE UML501 - MACHINE LEARNING UCS615 - IMAGE PROCESSING Semester Four UTA014 - ENGINEERING DESIGN PROJECT - II: The Buggy Project UCS409 - PROBABILITY AND STATISTICS UCS406 - DATA STRUCTURES AND ALGORITHMS Semester Three UTA013 - ENGINEERING DESIGN PROJECT - I: The Mangonal Project UCS405 - DISCRETE MATHEMATICAL STRUCTURES UCS303 - OPERATING SYSTEMS UCS520 - COMPUTER NETWORKS Semester Two UTA018 - OBJECT ORIENTED PROGRAMMING UTA015 - ENGINEERING DRAWING UHU003 - PROFESSIONAL COMMUNICATION UMA004 - MATHEMATICS - II Semester One UTA017 - COMPUTER PROGRAMMING - I UCB008 - APPLIED CHEMISTRY UMA003 - MATHEMATICS - I UES009 - MECHANICS

item.title: RKSD Public School, Kaithal
item.description: From class 9th to 12th, I studied at RKSD Public School, in Kaithal Haryana and graduated in 2017.s

item.title: Maharishi Vidya Mandir
item.description: This was my first school and the only school I attended in my home town - Yamuna Nagar. I attended MVM from Pre Nursery to class 8th. Fun Fact 1: Before begining of school activities and before leaving for home, we used to meditation in school. School policy, cool huh?! :) Fun Fact 2: I was part of National Cadit Corps and have NCC ‘A’ Certificate.
